name: Color Switch (itch) (Destroyer636)
description:
Objective: Survive as long as possible by matching the points of the triangle with the color of the rings.

Controls: Use the arrow keys to rotate the triangle. Press space to pause the game at any point. Click the settings icon to return to the settings page.

Features:

  • Increasing difficulty as you progress
  • Choose from different themes and starting difficulties
  •  Controllable audio settings
